subject: Inventions and Patents
Little League World Series
Children and Childhood
Baseball
Sporting Goods
lead_paragraph: In an era when adults make the news for accosting referees and filing lawsuits, Laurie Cronenbold offers a welcome reminder that some parents are making life better for young athletes.
